column5: Any reports from the NW end of Lac Seul yet? Our group will be hitting the Lac in 26 days! Temps, depth and colors would be nice to know!? Thanks and leave a few for us eh!!
It looks like a wet week ahead for the NW end of Lac Seul. How is the bite and water levels?
A little slow, 4-8 FOW seems to be key for us. Jigs and minnows or leech, some slip bobber action and some on lindy's. Our group of 3 has caught 10 over 21- biggest being 25". Now time to go get wet

Thanks for the report, at least the danger of fire will be reduced the next couple of days!? I awalys say the fish are already wet, whats a little rain!? Stay dry and leave a few for us! We will hitting Goose Bay in 25 days and maybe 2 hours!
In two weeks we will catching dinner we hope!! Any new reports from NW end of -Lac Seul?? Thanks!

Hot and still - little wind so far this week. I've seen water temps up to 75 degrees.I have fished mainly in Broad and Sunlight. A little bit of wind does wonders, otherwise, your guess is as good as mine, and many others at the camp, as to where to find 'em. The usual bevy of boats are parked at Ghost Narrows as I have gone by. I suppose they wouldn't be sitting there unless some sort of bite is on. However, the weather is magnificent, we've caught our share, and my son and daughter saw a big *** black bear give chase to a cow and her calf today at the north end of Sunlight today. About the coolest thing I've ever seen. Can't beat Lac Seul even if she's a bit winsome with her treasure.
Cant wait to get their we will be up their sat afternoon.
